title: Krzysztof Stojanowski
text:
Krzysztof Stojanowski (born 5 January 1979, in <a href="Sulech%C3%B3w">Sulechów</a>, <a href="Poland">Poland</a>) is a <a href="Motorcycle%20speedway">speedway</a> rider who rode for the <a href="Isle%20of%20Wight%20Islanders">Isle of Wight Islanders</a> in the British <a href="Premier%20League%20%28speedway%29">Premier League</a>.
Stojanowski was appointed captain on his arrival with the Islanders in 2006. In 2007 he was a member of the <a href="Premier%20League%20Four-Team%20Championship">Premier League Four-Team Championship</a> winning team.
